flavor: Lhazaar is either a wretched nation of pirates, outlaws, murderers, and brawlers, or the home of the world’s best mariners and richest seagoing merchants, depending on who you ask—or, for that matter, where you’re standing. Consisting of a tiny strip of Khorvaire proper and a vast archipelago, the Lhazaar Principalities stand at the edge of civilization, and of civilized law.
name: Lhazaar Principalities
